items.title: Tech could see a rebound soon. How to play it while hedging against potential downside

items.title: Deutsche Bank slashes Tesla price target as first-quarter deliveries come under pressure
items.description: Deutsche Bank sees "material downside" to Tesla's current-quarter deliveries.

items.title: Barclays upgrades Ferrari, sees attractive entry point after recent pullback
items.description: Ferrari has demonstrated its ability to remain resilient in the face of President Donald Trump's latest auto tariffs, Barclays said.

items.title: Jefferies upgrades this chip stock due to low China exposure compared to peers
items.description: The bank upgraded the semiconductor manufacturer to buy from hold.
